summary: This is an internal email update regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, specifically noting he was on suicide watch and had no psychological observation as of the morning of July 24, 2019. The document is significant as it provides a status report just weeks before Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, noted to be on suicide watch.

connections.description: LT, as a forensic psychologist at the correctional center, is providing a professional status update on inmate Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation.

events.title: Epstein Suicide Watch Status Update
events.description: An internal email update confirms Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch and had no psychological observation as of the morning of July 24, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York as of July 24, 2019.
The document records that Epstein had 'no psychological observation' at the time of the update.
The update was sent by a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service assigned to the correctional center.
This status report was created approximately two weeks before Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
